title: Feature: Add Image Download Capability
body:
## Description
Currently, the plant scraper only captures text information. This feature will add the ability to download and store plant images.

## Implementation Details
1. Add functionality to identify image URLs in plant pages
2. Create a download mechanism for images
3. Store images in an organized folder structure
4. Update JSON output to include references to downloaded images

## Acceptance Criteria
- All plant images are downloaded successfully
- Images are stored in a logical folder structure
- JSON output includes paths to downloaded images
- Error handling for failed downloads

title: Bug: Incorrect Handling of Special Characters in Plant Names
body:
## Description
Plant names with special characters (like apostrophes or accents) are not being processed correctly, leading to malformed JSON output.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Run the scraper on plants with names containing special characters
2. Observe the resulting JSON output

## Expected Behavior
Special characters should be properly escaped and preserved in the JSON output.

## Current Behavior
Special characters cause JSON parsing errors or are incorrectly escaped.

## Possible Solution
Implement proper character escaping for all text fields before JSON serialization.

title: Enhancement: Add Pagination Support for Large Plant Collections
body:
## Description
The current scraper doesn't handle pagination, limiting the number of plants that can be processed.

## Implementation Details
1. Detect pagination elements on the main plant listing page
2. Add logic to navigate through all available pages
3. Update the collection mechanism to aggregate plants from all pages
4. Add progress reporting for multi-page scraping

## Acceptance Criteria
- All pages of plant listings are processed
- No duplicate plants are collected
- Progress is reported during multi-page scraping
- Performance remains acceptable with large collections
